data.actual_result: You can't. The website thinks it opens the modal (observe the address link) but the modal doesn't show, exposing the behind-modal, but you can't interact with it.
data.expected_result: You can interact the HypeSquad website after being redirected to HypeSquad page
data.short_description: When you press logout from HypeSquad apply modal, after being redirected, you can't interact the website at all
data.steps_to_repro: - Open HypeSquad website (make sure you have logged in before opening the page) - Click 'Apply Now', press Logout - observe
